issue.title: All non-Pandas column throws NotImplemented: unhandled type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1153](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1153). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Pandas data frame with a none-only column throws "NotImplemented: unhandled type", when attempting to write as parquet file.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1153?focusedCommentId=16062964) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
This is fixed in the next release which we will hopefully push in the next days.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1153?focusedCommentId=17585950) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
